languages.text: {n}Гемункул смотрит на вас глазами, залитыми противоестественным светом — мерцающим серебристо-голубым морем, в глубинах которого мелькают жуткие тени. Его тело двигается рывками, а многочисленные конечности судорожно сокращаются.{/n} "Слуга Истины, ты превзош{mf|ел|ла} себя. Поступь ее тиха, но неизбежна, и когда благословение ее растечется по жилам ксеносской техники... Темный город будет ее владениями. Комморра падет".

traits.locale_text: {n}Гемункул смотрит на вас глазами, залитыми противоестественным светом — мерцающим серебристо-голубым морем, в глубинах которого мелькают жуткие тени. Его тело двигается рывками, а многочисленные конечности судорожно сокращаются.{/n} "Слуга Истины, ты превзош{mf|ел|ла} себя. Поступь ее тиха, но неизбежна, и когда благословение ее растечется по жилам ксеносской техники... Темный город будет ее владениями. Комморра падет".
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}The Haemonculus stares at you with eyes filled with unnatural light, like a shimmering ocean of silvery-blue with glimpses of nightmarish shadows lurking within. His body jerks and his many appendages contract convulsively.{/n} "Disciple of the Truth, you have outdone yourself. The Truth marches ever closer with quiet inevitability and once its blessing runs through the veins of this one's machinery... the Dark City will become its domain. Commorragh will fall."
languages.original_text: {n}Гемункул смотрит на вас глазами, залитыми противоестественным светом — мерцающим серебристо-голубым морем, в глубинах которого мелькают жуткие тени. Его тело двигается рывками, а многочисленные конечности судорожно сокращаются.{/n} "Слуга Истины, ты превзош{mf|ел|ла} себя. Поступь ее тиха, но неизбежна, и когда благословение ее растечется по жилам ксеносской техники... Темный город будет ее владениями. Комморра падет".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus stares at you with eyes filled with unnatural light, like a shimmering ocean of silvery-blue with glimpses of the nightmarish shadows lurking within. His body jerks, and his many appendages contract convulsively.{/n} "Disciple of the Truth, you have outdone yourself. The Truth marches ever closer with quiet inevitability, and once its blessing runs through the veins of this one's machinery... the Dark City will become its domain. Commorragh will fall."
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}L'hémoncule vous fixe avec des yeux baignés d'une lumière artificielle, comme un océan scintillant d'un bleu argenté laissant entrevoir les ombres cauchemardesques qui s'y tapissent. Son corps convulse et ses nombreux appendices se contractent nerveusement.{/n} « Vous vous êtes {mf|surpassé|surpassée}, disciple. La Vérité inexorable est en marche et lorsque sa bénédiction aura imprégné les entrailles de cette machine... la Cité Crépusculaire deviendra son domaine. Commorragh tombera. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus stares at you with eyes filled with unnatural light, like a shimmering ocean of silvery-blue with glimpses of nightmarish shadows lurking within. His body jerks and his many appendages contract convulsively.{/n} "Disciple of the Truth, you have outdone yourself. The Truth marches ever closer with quiet inevitability and once its blessing runs through the veins of this one's machinery... the Dark City will become its domain. Commorragh will fall."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'hémoncule vous fixe avec des yeux baignés d'une lumière artificielle, comme un océan scintillant d'un bleu argenté laissant entrevoir les ombres cauchemardesques qui s'y tapissent. Son corps convulse et ses nombreux appendices se contractent nerveusement.{/n} « Vous vous êtes {mf|surpassé|surpassée}, disciple. La Vérité inexorable est en marche et lorsque sa bénédiction aura imprégné les entrailles de cette machine... la Cité Crépusculaire deviendra son domaine. Commorragh tombera. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}血伶人盯着你，双眼中充满了不自然的光芒，仿佛闪烁的银蓝色海洋，其中潜伏着噩梦般的阴影。他的身体抽搐起来，无数附肢痉挛地收缩着。{/n}“真理的信徒啊，你已经超越了自我。真理的降临之刻已经越来越近了。只要它的祝福流过这个人的机器制成的血管……黑暗之城就将成为真理的领地，科摩罗必将沦陷。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus stares at you with eyes filled with unnatural light, like a shimmering ocean of silvery-blue with glimpses of nightmarish shadows lurking within. His body jerks and his many appendages contract convulsively.{/n} "Disciple of the Truth, you have outdone yourself. The Truth marches ever closer with quiet inevitability and once its blessing runs through the veins of this one's machinery... the Dark City will become its domain. Commorragh will fall."

traits.locale_text: {n}血伶人盯着你，双眼中充满了不自然的光芒，仿佛闪烁的银蓝色海洋，其中潜伏着噩梦般的阴影。他的身体抽搐起来，无数附肢痉挛地收缩着。{/n}“真理的信徒啊，你已经超越了自我。真理的降临之刻已经越来越近了。只要它的祝福流过这个人的机器制成的血管……黑暗之城就将成为真理的领地，科摩罗必将沦陷。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスがあなたを見つめる目は異常な光に満ちていた。それはまるで銀色に輝く海のようだが、その中に悪夢のような影が潜んでいるのが垣間見られる。彼の体はピクピクと痙攣し、多くの付属器官が収縮している。{/n}「真理の弟子よ、よくここまで来たものだ。真理は静かに、しかし避けがたく近づいており、その祝福がこの機械の血管を巡るとき…仄暗き都は真理の領域となるだろう。コモラフは陥落する」
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus stares at you with eyes filled with unnatural light, like a shimmering ocean of silvery-blue with glimpses of nightmarish shadows lurking within. His body jerks and his many appendages contract convulsively.{/n} "Disciple of the Truth, you have outdone yourself. The Truth marches ever closer with quiet inevitability and once its blessing runs through the veins of this one's machinery... the Dark City will become its domain. Commorragh will fall."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスがあなたを見つめる目は異常な光に満ちていた。それはまるで銀色に輝く海のようだが、その中に悪夢のような影が潜んでいるのが垣間見られる。彼の体はピクピクと痙攣し、多くの付属器官が収縮している。{/n}「真理の弟子よ、よくここまで来たものだ。真理は静かに、しかし避けがたく近づいており、その祝福がこの機械の血管を巡るとき…仄暗き都は真理の領域となるだろう。コモラフは陥落する」
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}Der Haemonculus starrt dich an, seine Augen sind dabei von unnatürlichem Licht erfüllt. Sie wirken wie ein silbrig-blau schimmernder Ozean, in dem sich albtraumhafte, lauernde Schatten abzeichnen. Sein Körper zuckt und seine vielen Gliedmaßen ziehen sich unkontrolliert zusammen.{/n} "{mf|Jünger|Jüngerin} der Wahrheit, Ihr habt Euch selbst übertroffen. Die Wahrheit rückt mit stiller Unvermeidlichkeit heran und sobald ihr Segen durch die Adern dieser Maschinerie fließt ... wird die Dunkle Stadt zu ihrem Reich. Commorragh wird fallen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus stares at you with eyes filled with unnatural light, like a shimmering ocean of silvery-blue with glimpses of nightmarish shadows lurking within. His body jerks and his many appendages contract convulsively.{/n} "Disciple of the Truth, you have outdone yourself. The Truth marches ever closer with quiet inevitability and once its blessing runs through the veins of this one's machinery... the Dark City will become its domain. Commorragh will fall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Haemonculus starrt dich an, seine Augen sind dabei von unnatürlichem Licht erfüllt. Sie wirken wie ein silbrig-blau schimmernder Ozean, in dem sich albtraumhafte, lauernde Schatten abzeichnen. Sein Körper zuckt und seine vielen Gliedmaßen ziehen sich unkontrolliert zusammen.{/n} "{mf|Jünger|Jüngerin} der Wahrheit, Ihr habt Euch selbst übertroffen. Die Wahrheit rückt mit stiller Unvermeidlichkeit heran und sobald ihr Segen durch die Adern dieser Maschinerie fließt ... wird die Dunkle Stadt zu ihrem Reich. Commorragh wird fallen."
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}El hemónculo te mira fijamente con un resplandor antinatural en los ojos, como un rutilante océano azul plateado en el que se vislumbran las sombras de pesadilla que acechan bajo sus aguas. Su cuerpo se convulsiona y sus numerosos apéndices se contraen espasmódicamente.{/n} «{mf|Discípulo|Discípula} de la Verdad, te has superado a ti {mf|mismo|misma}. La Verdad se aproxima con silenciosa inevitabilidad, y cuando su bendición corra por las venas de la maquinaria de esta marioneta... la Ciudad Siniestra se convertirá en su dominio. Commorragh caerá».
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus stares at you with eyes filled with unnatural light, like a shimmering ocean of silvery-blue with glimpses of nightmarish shadows lurking within. His body jerks and his many appendages contract convulsively.{/n} "Disciple of the Truth, you have outdone yourself. The Truth marches ever closer with quiet inevitability and once its blessing runs through the veins of this one's machinery... the Dark City will become its domain. Commorragh will fall."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hemónculo te mira fijamente con un resplandor antinatural en los ojos, como un rutilante océano azul plateado en el que se vislumbran las sombras de pesadilla que acechan bajo sus aguas. Su cuerpo se convulsiona y sus numerosos apéndices se contraen espasmódicamente.{/n} «{mf|Discípulo|Discípula} de la Verdad, te has superado a ti {mf|mismo|misma}. La Verdad se aproxima con silenciosa inevitabilidad, y cuando su bendición corra por las venas de la maquinaria de esta marioneta... la Ciudad Siniestra se convertirá en su dominio. Commorragh caerá».
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: {n}Haimonkulus sana, içinde kâbusumsu gölgelerin kol gezdiği, doğal olmayan gümüşümsü mavi renklerle titreşen bir okyanusu andıran, doğa dışı bir ışıkla dolu gözlerle bakıyor. Bedeni sarsılıyor ve üzerindeki sayısız eklenti kasılarak titreşiyor.{/n} "Hakikatin müridi, kendini aştın. Hakikat, sessiz bir kaçınılmazlıkla giderek yaklaşıyor. Kutsaması, bu varlığın makinesinin damarlarına aktığında Kara Şehir de diyarı olacak. Commorragh düşecek."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus stares at you with eyes filled with unnatural light, like a shimmering ocean of silvery-blue with glimpses of nightmarish shadows lurking within. His body jerks and his many appendages contract convulsively.{/n} "Disciple of the Truth, you have outdone yourself. The Truth marches ever closer with quiet inevitability and once its blessing runs through the veins of this one's machinery... the Dark City will become its domain. Commorragh will fall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Haimonkulus sana, içinde kâbusumsu gölgelerin kol gezdiği, doğal olmayan gümüşümsü mavi renklerle titreşen bir okyanusu andıran, doğa dışı bir ışıkla dolu gözlerle bakıyor. Bedeni sarsılıyor ve üzerindeki sayısız eklenti kasılarak titreşiyor.{/n} "Gerçek'in müridi, kendini aştın. Gerçek, sessiz bir kaçınılmazlıkla giderek yaklaşıyor ve kutsaması bu varlığın makinesinin damarlarına aktığında, Kara Şehir onun diyarı hâline gelecek. Commorragh düşecek."
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire
